meanings: (집단, 단체) group, organization, syndicate, (범죄 조직) ring, gang, organize

vlive.korean: [1년째 똠얌꿍만 들으면 조직세포부터 브레이크댄스 추는 중] 확인을 했다고! [For a year, my heart has been beating fast when I hear her "tom yum kung"] the translator earlier! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [1년 전 오늘의 CHUNG HA] 또박또박 심장을 꿍꿍 치고 지나간다.. 똠..얌..꿍..💓 (CHUNG HA pronouncing Tom Yum Kung a year ago)
vlive.english: [For a year, my heart has been beating fast when I hear her "tom yum kung"] the translator earlier!

vlive.korean: [팀워크 중무장] [똘똘 뭉쳐 하나의 조직이 되어라!] [Teamwork] [Be one team!] View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처 스페셜시즌 EP41_인생 한방! 투자금 대박?
[장도리로 조직폭력배들을 소탕하는 신!] [the gangsters with a claw hammer!] View video MONSTA X : [Replay] MONSTA X-RAY 3 (몬스타엑스레이 3)_5화
피부 아래 조직은 표피를 보호 하는 역할을 해요. So dermis found under the skin protecting the epidermis. 듣기 View video Wishtrend TV : Why Do Korean Girls Look So Young? | Korean Anti Aging Skin Care Tips | Wishtrend TV
vlive.english: So dermis found under the skin protecting the epidermis.

vlive.korean: 네가 조직 생활을 잘 몰라서 그러는 거 아는데... I get that it's because you don't know how it works, but... 듣기 View video WHYNOT TV : [다르게 적히는 연애] EP06. 첫 키스의 타이밍
vlive.english: I get that it's because you don't know how it works, but...

examples.korean: The prisoner was subjected to systematic torture. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 죄수는 조직적인 고문을 당했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The organization is cloaked in a shroud of secrecy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 조직은 비밀의 장막에 가려져 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The organization is cloaked in a shroud of secrecy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She has an undoubted talent as an organizer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 조직자로서 의심할 여지없는 재능을 지니고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has an undoubted talent as an organizer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We need fewer organizers and more doers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 조직자는 더 적은 수가, 행동가는 더 많은 수가 필요하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We need fewer organizers and more doers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The organization should be allowed to develop organically. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 조직은 유기적으로 발전할 수 있도록 놔 두어야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The organization should be allowed to develop organically. Add to Wordbook
